page.title: 03Mr Thompson (a farmworker)
page.content: On Thursday my dad got up at 0600, dressed and had some toast. He made a flask of coffee and some sandwiches for work. He starts at 0730. His first job was clearing machinery to make room for the round bales of silage. At 0900 he has his break.At 0930 he put the bale spike on the loader. Then dad made a feed mix for the cattle and sheep. Tractors, trailers, baler, and loader went down to the field. A mechanic came to set up the new baler.At first they could not get it working properly. Dad and Ray were unloading hay until 1300. He had dinner then went back at 1400. The silage bales were put into bags,tied and then stacked.My dad finished work at 20.00.He did the crossword,then went for a drink and to see some friends.He went to bed at 2330.
